Description:
'Baillie': Refined South Yarra Elegance
In one of South Yarra's most iconic and sought-after boulevards, this flawlessly appointed and impressively proportioned two bedroom apartment is presented as new, within the highly coveted and boutique, 'Baillie' building. The home presents outstanding credentials for home owners & investors seeking a timeless and contemporary foothold in this sun-draped street within one of inner-Melbourne's most prestigious postcodes.
With a bespoke sense of designer style, the open-plan kitchen / meals / living spills easily out to a broad balcony that is suited for entertaining and quiet reflection, as it overlooks its verdant streetscape. A suite of Miele appliances compliments marble kitchen benches and volumes of soft close cabinetry, in a clear commitment to quality that extends also to the master bedroom ensuite and the central bathroom. Highly secure with video entry, basement parking, a storage cage and elevator access, the home also features substantial robes built into each bedroom, floating wall-mounted vanities in each bathroom and a sleek European laundry.
Poised to enjoy the very best of Chapel St, Commercial Rd and Hawksburn Village, the local cafe culture, restaurants, bars, strip shopping and nightlife, whilst there are city-bound trams and trains from Hawksburn Railway Station within metres and beautiful local parks.
